Description:
Position Title:             Shipping OfficerEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                         up to 7K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:            Dubai, UAEAbout the Client:A Dubai based international shipping vessel agency servicing Africa and Europe.Job Description:Prepare and manage all required shipping documentation, such as bills of lading, commercial invoices, packing lists, and certificates of origin.
Issue DA (Documents against Acceptance) in order for invoices to be kept on track for every shipping transaction as per company's guidelines.
Ensure compliance with international shipping regulations and customs requirements.
Coordinate the booking of cargo space with shipping lines, airlines, or freight forwarders.
Determine the most cost-effective and efficient shipping routes and methods for each shipment.Skills
Skills:
Open to Asians and CIS nationals
45 years old and below
Minimum of 2 years solid experience in invoicing and OR shipping admin within an international environment
